Articles.Content:
I made this one day, when I was impossibly bored. It came out amazing. It was originally a centrifuge, but after the top bit popped off and the launch clamps decoupled, I came up with the idea for the second one. First, I'll give you an imgur album:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Jbarg)

And now, the classic waterlubber video: 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jsp-w4GAxcs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I won't be posting a craft file, since this has lots of mods and was intended to be humorous, but if enough people ask I will.
Thank you so much! I needed a good laugh and once again, you delivered splendidly. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
It's what I do. Wait until I strap rockets to the Kegway

> 
> It's what I do. Wait until I strap rockets to the Kegway

The real challenge to that one is going to be keeping Jeb away from it long enough to let someone else test it. You know how he loves more boosters. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
